DOC.brief_title: Combination Chemotherapy Treating Older Women With Metastatic Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine survival without degradation quality life elderly woman metastatic breast cancer treat leucovorin calcium , fluorouracil , mitoxantrone . - Determine efficacy regimen , term response survival without progression , patient . - Determine tolerance patient regimen . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive mitoxantrone IV leucovorin calcium IV 2 hour day 1 . Patients receive fluorouracil IV 46 hour day 1-2 . Treatment repeat every 21 day maximum 8 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Quality life assess baseline , 3 course , treatment completion . Patients follow every 3 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 39 patient accrue study .
